author: axic3354
content: Thank you all for the calls (especially <@!415548822983278593> <@!301186049323958275> <@!243183686562873344> for your insights). I will try to add a few more points to the "issues" document today/tomorrow so we can discuss it on Monday.  Will probably also extend the "spec" document with some clarifications based on what we discussed today.

author: axic3354
content: While there are so many channels and some get more attention than others, if we are getting more active on the ASE topic, should we have a dedicated channel for it, which can then be archived once the topic is finished?

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't mind more channels, but I also am fine with it sharing this channel since this channel is pretty quiet and as I indicated, I think there is a reasonably strong dependency on ASE for state expiry.

author: sky.cactus
content: If others want a dedicated channel I am happy to chat there though. ðŸ™‚

author: ansgar.eth
content: I think I have a weak preference for a separate ASE channel.

author: ansgar.eth
